about_the_game:
God s' Margarita is a story-driven adventure and a walking simulation. The game takes place in the post-apocalyptic landscapes of AI Legave a thousand years into the future. After hiding from the world for two years, Reniat Noc travels through the vast environments of his homeland to reunite with his friend Elbep. On the road ahead, he will partake in many adventures, challenging situations, and discover the history of his abandoned homeland.



~> UNCOVER YOUR FUTURE THROUGH THE PAST
Traverse the semi-open world, the wasteland of AI Legave to discover the history that will shape your journey.


~> EMPLOY FUTURISTIC GADGETS AND ASSETS
Have you ever wished to walk on water? Well, now you can't... But! You can turn invisible, run with superhuman speed, and pass-through walls. Yep, that's the future all right!


~> EXPLORE UNIQUE LOCATIONS
A thousand years in the future there will be everything left to explore! Especially when all the explorers are gone.


~> RELISH THE MIRACLES OF EXISTING ALONE
The hunting dreams, the unjudged imagination, the sound of the wind passing you by, the need to find your lost friend, the joy of running alone towards the unknown!


~> HOOK ALIEN FISH AND MORE
You will never know what is hidden inside the white muds. But you can fish it out!


~> LOOK AT THE HORIZON AND UNDER THE ROCKS
Run, Discover, Collect, Face danger and challenges, Enjoy the loneliness, and embody the disposition of Reniat Noc.

content_descriptors.notes: God s' Margarita has depictions of death but with attention to emotion and with no graphic content. The sexual scenes in the game are showing consensual sex and they appear rarely.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.13 (High Sierra)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz dual i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro 5200 1536 MB or AMD Radeon R9 M370X 2GB or Metal-capable equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.15.7 (Catalina)
  • Processor: 3.1 GHz 4Core Intel i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 560 4 GB or Metal-capable equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Βecome the latest hope of humanity! Embody the psyche of Reniat Noc and explore the post-apocalyptic lands of AI Legave. Customize your character with futuristic gadgets, solve real-life puzzles, discover the history that led to your present, and bring life into the future.
